review_data.title: Herzhaft und authentisch
review_data.content: Herzhafte Bedienung. Wir kommen fast wöchentlich und wurden noch kein einziges Mal enttäuscht! Die Burger sind fantastisch un sie haben...More

review_data.title: A rip-off
review_data.content: 9 francs for a bottle of sparkling water. Zurich is not cheap and restaurants are definitely going through rough times, but who would dare charge this much for a bottle of water? You just need to go to Mamas Bulle to find out. And this...More

review_data.title: GO HERE FOR GREAT FOOD & A GOOD TIME!
review_data.content: Second Time: Great Service, Great Food - Good Vibes :) Recommend it 100%! Go here for fantastic food and a good time! :)

review_data.title: Delicious flat iron steaks
review_data.content: We had the larger 350g flat iron steak for dinner with fries and the sauce board (containing 4 different sauces, enough for 2 persons). The meat was tender and cooked to perfection (medium rare). The price is reasonable, however if you are really hungry this...More

review_data.title: Great foody place!
review_data.content: Service was great, food was simply fantastic and the value for money (flat iron steak) cant be beaten anywhere close! warm hearted!
